topic_or_construct: importance of subjective value in parenthood decision
measured_by: self-reported importance rating of the 'subjective value' decision criterion
justification: “Participants rated six decision criteria… what it will feel like to have the experiences and emotions of being a parent (‘subjective value’).”

topic_or_construct: importance of financial costs in parenthood decision
measured_by: self-reported importance rating of the 'financial costs' decision criterion
justification: “Participants rated six decision criteria, including… financial costs (‘cost’).”

topic_or_construct: willingness to gain information about subjective value
measured_by: hypothetical ‘transporter’ scenario: yes/no acceptance and willingness-to-pay amount
justification: “We asked participants if they would take this opportunity… and how much money they would be willing to pay for this opportunity.”

topic_or_construct: adequacy of information for evaluating subjective value
justification: “we also asked them to rate the extent to which they felt they had adequate information to evaluate each criterion.”

topic_or_construct: uncertainty about preference for having children
measured_by: self-reported certainty rating regarding desire to have children
justification: “we asked… whether or not they wanted to have children, and how certain they were about this preference.”
